document.full_text: notre dame announced it will no longer use hydraulic lifts for videographers at football practices, five months after a student fell to his death when one of the machines toppled over.
document.title: notre dame scraps hydraulic lifts after death
lines_and_colors: notre dame announced it will no longer use hydraulic lifts for videographers at football practices, five months after a student fell to his death when one of the machines toppled over.
